answerText: Dip-slip faults[10] Strike-slip faults can develop in at these boundaries where tectonic plates move towards each other.  One plate usually subducts into the mantle in these regions.
heading: Western Invitational Tournament |2013 | Bentley Gioia Hunter Lopez-Lago | 17 | Science | Other | College
subject: Science
question: Question: The amount of motion in these faults can be calculated as heave squared plus throw squared.  For 10 points each: [10] Identify these faults, in whose normal variety the hanging wall moves downward relative to the footwall.
